dictionary.lore: The Holy Robe is said to rouse and maximize one's primeval survival instincts. Records say the robe was knitted by the cleric Emeldia in order to change the mind of a man who attempted suicide. Those who wear the Holy Robe are spared from death, though not from their injuries, so they're forced to endure their self-inflicted pain uttil they eventually give up on the thought of dying.

usage.name: 輝鎧ルディバ・マクス
